abstract: Ford Super Duty trucks will be sold with new aluminum body, like smaller F-150, beginning in fall 2016.
lead_paragraph: Ford Super Duty trucks will be sold with a new aluminum body, like their smaller sibling the F-150, starting next fall.

headline.main: Ford Super Duty Trucks to Have Aluminum Body Panels in 2017
headline.print_headline: Ford Super Duty Trucks to Have Aluminum Body Panels in 2017
